kaspaPage.chartDescription: An interactive TradingView chart will be displayed here soon
kaspaPage.kaspaDescription1: Kaspa is a revolutionary Proof-of-Work blockchain based on the PHANTOM/GhostDAG protocol. Unlike traditional blockchains that process blocks sequentially, Kaspa enables parallel block processing.
kaspaPage.kaspaDescription2: With a block time of just 1 second and 10 blocks per second, Kaspa is one of the fastest PoW blockchains in the world. The technology enables high transaction speeds while maintaining decentralization and security.
kaspaPage.blockdagDescription1: BlockDAG (Directed Acyclic Graph) is a revolutionary data structure that allows multiple blocks to be processed simultaneously, rather than arranging them sequentially like traditional blockchains.
kaspaPage.blockdagDescription2: Kaspa's GhostDAG protocol sorts all parallel blocks into a consistent order and prevents double-spending while enabling high throughput.

dexPage.title: DEX - Decentralized Exchanges
dexPage.subtitle: Trade KRC-20 tokens in a decentralized and secure way
dexPage.dexVsCex: DEX vs CEX - What's the Difference?
dexPage.dexPro1: Full control over your private keys - Not your keys, not your coins
dexPage.dexPro2: No registration or KYC required - Your privacy stays intact
dexPage.dexPro3: Direct trading without intermediaries - No central authority
dexPage.dexPro4: Available 24/7 - No maintenance windows or shutdowns
dexPage.cexPoint1: Exchange controls your funds - Risk of hacks or insolvency
dexPage.cexPoint2: KYC/AML requirements - Personal data is stored
dexPage.cexPoint4: Possible trading restrictions or account freezes
dexPage.infoNote: KASPA-NEXUS recommends using decentralized exchanges for maximum security and control over your cryptocurrencies. Always keep your private keys safe.
dexPage.howToTrade: How to Trade on a DEX
dexPage.step1Desc: Connect your Kaspa wallet to the DEX of your choice. You maintain full control.
dexPage.step2Desc: Choose the token pair you want to trade and enter the amount.
dexPage.step3Desc: Confirm the transaction in your wallet. The swap is executed directly on the blockchain.

board.title: Investment Hub
board.subtitle: AI-powered portfolio tools for smart investments
board.intro: Welcome to the KASPA-NEXUS Investment Hub. Here you'll find our AI-powered tools designed to help you make informed investment decisions. Whether you want to build a new portfolio or analyze your existing one - our artificial intelligence supports you with real-time market data and professional recommendations.

generator.title: Portfolio Generator
generator.description: Let our AI create a customized crypto portfolio for you. Based on your budget and risk tolerance, the AI analyzes the current market and recommends the optimal allocation.
generator.feature4: 3 scenarios: Best Case, Likely, Worst Case

analyzer.title: Portfolio Analyzer
analyzer.description: Already have crypto holdings? Let our AI analyze your portfolio. You'll receive a professional evaluation with strengths, weaknesses, and optimization suggestions.
analyzer.feature1: Analysis of up to 15 different coins

step1.title: Enter Data
step1.desc: Enter your budget and risk level or list your current holdings.

step2.title: AI Analyzes
step2.desc: Our AI checks current market data, trends, and risk factors in real-time.

step3.title: Get Results
step3.desc: You receive a detailed recommendation with reasoning and forecasts.

aiPowered.title: Powered by AI
aiPowered.description: Our portfolio tools use multiple AI systems that analyze current market data from CoinGecko and other sources. Every recommendation is based on real-time data - no mock data, no outdated information. The AI considers BTC dominance, Fear & Greed Index, market cap, and current trends.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.description: Manage and analyze your crypto portfolio

investment.comingSoonDesc: This feature will be available soon. We are working on advanced investment tools.

generator.title: Generate Portfolio
generator.conservativeDesc: Focus on established coins (BTC, ETH). Lower returns, higher security.
generator.balancedDesc: Mix of blue chips and growth assets. Balanced risk-reward.
generator.aggressiveDesc: Higher allocation to altcoins and KRC-20. Maximum growth potential.
generator.aiWorkingDesc: Analyzing current market conditions and generating optimal portfolio...

analyzer.title: Analyze Your Portfolio
analyzer.placeholder: Enter your holdings, e.g.: 0.5 BTC, 2 ETH, 5000 KAS
analyzer.inputHint: Max. 15 coins per analysis. All crypto coins supported.
analyzer.aiWorkingDesc: Evaluating your portfolio and generating recommendations...

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This is not financial advice. AI-generated recommendations are for educational purposes only. Always do your own research. Only invest what you can afford to lose.

signalsBoard.title: AI Trading Signals
signalsBoard.subtitle: AI-validated trading signals with triple validation for maximum quality

whatAreSignals.title: What Are Trading Signals?
whatAreSignals.description: Trading signals are professional buy and sell recommendations that are analyzed and generated by our AI. Each signal contains an optimal entry point, stop-loss for risk limitation, and up to 5 take-profit targets. Our signals are only issued when all 3 AI models agree.

tripleAi.title: 3-AI Validation
tripleAi.description: Our unique system uses three independent AI models that analyze each potential signal. Only when all three models agree is the signal passed on to our users. This minimizes false signals and maximizes quality.
tripleAi.ai2: Focus on pattern recognition and trends
tripleAi.ruleDesc: A signal is only issued when all 3 AI models agree. If only 2 out of 3 agree, the signal is discarded.

supportedCoins.title: Supported Coins
supportedCoins.description: We focus on selected coins with high liquidity and market capitalization to ensure the best signal quality.
supportedCoins.kas: Focus Coin - Our specialty in the Kaspa ecosystem
supportedCoins.btc: Market Leader - For stable, less volatile signals
supportedCoins.eth: Smart Contracts - Altcoin leader with strong correlation

signalStructure.title: Signal Structure
signalStructure.description: Each signal is structured and contains all the information you need for a trade:
signalStructure.entryDesc: The optimal buy price. We recommend entering close to this price.
signalStructure.stopLossDesc: Automatic sell for loss limitation. Typically 8-12% below entry.
signalStructure.takeProfitDesc: Up to 5 profit targets with increasing percentages. Partial sales recommended.
signalStructure.confidenceDesc: Signal strength (60-100%). Higher value = stronger AI agreement.

trailingSystem.title: Trailing Stop-Loss System
trailingSystem.description: Our intelligent trailing system automatically secures profits as soon as take-profit targets are reached:
trailingSystem.benefit: Benefit: Once TP1 is reached, you can no longer lose - the SL is at your entry price!

btcWatching.title: BTC-Watching Safety System
btcWatching.description: Bitcoin determines the crypto market. During strong BTC movements, we automatically pause signals to protect you:

quality.title: Quality Over Quantity
quality.description: We want you to really win. That's why we focus on fewer, better signals instead of mass.
quality.not1: 20+ signals per day without quality check
quality.not2: Signals for every small price movement
quality.our2: Triple AI validation for every signal

disclaimer.title: Risk Warning
disclaimer.text: Trading cryptocurrencies is highly risky. The signals provided here are not financial advice. Only invest money you can afford to lose. Past performance does not guarantee future results. DYOR - Do Your Own Research.
